sentences.en: Describe project deliverables in the vaguest possible terms so sponsors and reviewers have plenty of leeway to reinvent the project outputs repeatedly as the project unfolds.
sentences.cn: 用尽可能模糊的语言描述项目可交付成果，让发起人及审核者随着项目的开展，能有足够的空间不断地重新定义项目成果。

sentences.en: Do you have the vaguest notion ( of ) what you are asking me for?
sentences.cn: 你一点也不知道你在向我提出什么要求 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you have the vaguest notion what you are asking me for?
sentences.cn: 你一点也不知道你在向我提出什麽要求 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even the vaguest, if reliable, hint in direction would lead to pot of gold.
sentences.cn: 只要是可靠的, 哪怕只是模糊的方向性提示也能让人获得不菲的收获.

sentences.en: I haven't the vaguest ( ie slightest ) idea / notion what you mean.
sentences.cn: 我一点都不明白你的意思.

sentences.en: I haven't the vaguest idea what she means.
sentences.cn: 我一点也不知道她是什么意思.

sentences.en: I haven't the vaguest idea what to do.
I haven't the vaguest idea who he is.
I haven't the vaguest notion what to do.
sentences.cn: 我一点儿也不晓得怎样办才好.

sentences.en: PEOPLE can lose clearance on the vaguest excuse, without being told why - it's a new McCarthyist mood.
sentences.cn: 仅仅因为莫须有的理由, 就可能无法通过忠诚审查 —— 这是一种新的麦卡锡主义.

trans.tran_cn: 模糊的( vague的最高级 )，（思想上）不清楚的，（表达或感知）含糊的，不具体的
